modName: Magic card font replacer - now with accents
summary: Planeswalker/Magic card font for Skyrim, with accents
descriptionHtml:
Hi there,

The Morrowind font included in Main Font Replacement (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=95) doesn\'t have accent at all - it\'s not compatible with the french (my native language ;)) version of the game. I found a font pack which happens to include a accented version.

Thanks to Yanek who wrote a short and comprehensiv tutorial on font conversion there (french only): http://forum.wiwiland.net/index.php?/topic/51836-interface-polices-personnalisees-et-tutoriel/page__pid__692567#entry692567

It should be fine for both french and spanish version of Skyrim

PS: as I\'m playing right now in english, I couldn\'t do extensive tests but the accents display correctly when I rename enchanted items

Installation========
Just extract the archive in your Skyril folder, or install it via Nexus Mod Manager (I recommend)

Update===========
04/02/2012=>v1.1. Accented capital letters fixed, everything should be fine
author: Gebreth
